title: Selendang (shoulder Cloth), early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: tied resist patterning in warp (ikat) on plain weave
description: Woven textile (shoulder cloth) for ceremonial dress and decoration with European influenced design of floral arrangement. Features row of white triangles with figures inside. Fringed at one end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Selendang (shoulder Cloth), early 20th century.
early 20th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: tied resist patterning in warp (ikat) on plain weave. Gift of Clara Waldeck. 1977-103-1.
